00047 #elif defined(Q_CC_MSVC)

00112 class QCPAbstractPlottable : public QObject
00113 {
00114 public:
00115   QCPAbstractPlottable(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis);
00116   virtual ~QCPAbstractPlottable() {}
00117   
00118   // getters:
00119   QCustomPlot *parentPlot() const { return mParentPlot; }
00120   QString name() const { return mName; }
00121   bool visible() const { return mVisible; }
00122   QPen pen() const { return mPen; }
00123   QBrush brush() const { return mBrush; }
00124   QCPAxis *keyAxis() const { return mKeyAxis; }
00125   QCPAxis *valueAxis() const { return mValueAxis; }
00126   
00127   // setters:
00128   void setName(const QString &name);
00129   void setVisible(bool visible);
00130   void setPen(const QPen &pen);
00131   void setBrush(const QBrush &brush);
00132   void setKeyAxis(QCPAxis *axis);
00133   void setValueAxis(QCPAxis *axis);
00134 
00135   // non-property methods:
00136   void rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge=false) const;
00137   void rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge=false) const;
00138   void rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge=false) const;
00139   virtual void clearData() = 0;
00140   virtual bool addToLegend() const;
00141   virtual bool removeFromLegend() const;
00142   
00143 protected:
00147   enum SignDomain {sdNegative, 
00148                    sdBoth,     
00149                    sdPositive  
00150                   };
00151   QCustomPlot *mParentPlot;
00152   QString mName;
00153   bool mVisible;
00154   QPen mPen;
00155   QBrush mBrush;
00156   QCPAxis *mKeyAxis, *mValueAxis;
00157   
00158   virtual void draw(QPainter *painter) const = 0;
00159   virtual void drawLegendIcon(QPainter *painter, const QRect &rect) const = 0;
00160   virtual QCPRange getKeyRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain=sdBoth) const = 0;
00161   virtual QCPRange getValueRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain=sdBoth) const = 0;
00162   void coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x, double &y) const;
00163   const QPointF coordsToPixels(double key, double value) const;
00164   
00165   friend class QCustomPlot;
00166   friend class QCPPlottableLegendItem;
00167 };

00263   void removeData(double key);
00264   virtual void clearData();

00542 class QCPLegend : public QObject
00543 {
00544   Q_OBJECT
00545 public:
00549   enum PositionStyle {psManual,      
00550                       psTopLeft,     
00551                       psTop,         
00552                       psTopRight,    
00553                       psRight,       
00554                       psBottomRight, 
00555                       psBottom,      
00556                       psBottomLeft,  
00557                       psLeft         
00558                      };

00581   int marginBottom() const { return mMarginBottom; }

00583   QSize iconSize() const { return mIconSize; }
00584   int iconTextPadding() const { return mIconTextPadding; }
00585   QPen iconBorderPen() const { return mIconBorderPen; }
00586

00590   void setFont(const QFont &font);
00591   void setPositionStyle(PositionStyle legendPositionStyle);

00881 class QCustomPlot : public QWidget
00882 {
00883   Q_OBJECT
00885   Q_PROPERTY(QString title READ title WRITE setTitle)
00886   Q_PROPERTY(QRect axisRect READ axisRect WRITE setAxisRect)

00891   Q_PROPERTY(int autoMargin READ autoMargin WRITE setAutoMargin)

00893   Q_PROPERTY(Qt::Orientations rangeDrag READ rangeDrag WRITE setRangeDrag)

00903   enum AntialiasedElement {aeAxes      = 0x001, 
00904                            aeGrid      = 0x002,

00906                            aeGraphs    = 0x008, 
00907                            aeScatters  = 0x010,

00909                            aeFills     = 0x040, 
00910                            aeZeroLine  = 0x080  
00911                           };
00912   Q_ENUMS(AntialiasedElement)
00913   Q_DECLARE_FLAGS(AntialiasedElements, AntialiasedElement)
